name: Employee Training Expenses Tracker
description: Welcome to our user-friendly Employee Training Expenses tracker which is designed to empower business owners with comprehensive insights to make informed decisions on employee training and its related expenses.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?AutoDocCreator lets you instantly generate PDFs from Google Docs using data from your Notion Database. All generated PDFs are automatically saved bac
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Install the extension and setup the automation.; One-time setup and configuration; Quick 5-minute installation process; Copy Notion Database properties placeholders; Paste them into your Google Document template; One-time setup per document template; Set your preferred automation schedule; Automatically scans Notion database
